nodes.text: A Lepi attended a shockball match at Ashton Stadium aboard the Wheel on the day that the Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and his Padawan Anakin Skywalker came to investigate Grynask Sanberge. As the Lepi was yelling at the referee droid, Sanberge—actually Mace Windu in disguise—noticed the Jedi's presence and got up from his seat, knocking the long-eared alien over. When Kenobi asked the Lepi of Sanberge's whereabouts, the disgruntled shockball fan directed them to a nearby ultraspa.
